mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_id) AS reviewCount, SUM(r.like_count) AS likeCount, u.grade_id AS currentGradeId FROM user u JOIN review r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING COUNT(r.review_id) >= 50
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_score (user_id, review_count, like_count, weighted_score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{reviewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{weightedScore}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE review_count = VALUES(review_count), like_count = VALUES(like_count), weighted_score = VALUES(weighted_score);
